name: swap
description: Server side apps that feel client side.

scripts.build: npm run clean; parcel build cypress/app/parcel.html --no-minify --no-source-maps --out-dir cypress/app/dist --public-url /dist
scripts.test: npm run build; node cypress/app/app.js & npm run cypress:run; kill $!
scripts.test:dev: npm run dev & npm run cypress:open

author: Shane Thacker <shane@steadymade.com>
